articles.author: James Oaten
articles.title: ABC South Asia correspondent James Oaten reflects on a confronting assignment inside a COVID-19 intensive care ward in India - ABC News
articles.description: In the Indian city of Nagpur, one in three COVID tests are positive. Travelling there to film inside a hospital caring for the sickest patients required extreme safety measures but South Asia correspondent James Oaten is alarmed at the complacency in India as…
articles.content:
I'm sitting on a plane flying from Nagpur to Delhi and I'm filled with anger.
I can see a young man, maybe in his mid to late twenties, sitting there without his mask on despite having been reminded… [+6258 chars]

articles.author: Delfin Dioquino
articles.title: E-Gilas crushes Vietnam, Maldives by 132 points in FIBA Esports Open III - Rappler
articles.description: E-Gilas Pilipinas tops its group in the Southeast Asia conference of the FIBA Esports Open with dominant wins over Vietnam and Maldives
articles.content: Custer "Custer" Galas torched Maldives with 24 points, 8 assists, and 3 steals, while Philippe "IzzoIV" Herrero IV flirted with a triple-double with 13 points, 17 rebounds, 8 assists, 4 blocks, and 2… [+7 chars]

articles.author: Wesley LeBlanc
articles.title: The Next Possible 'Earth' Might Be a Planet With Two Suns - IGN Southeast Asia
articles.description: Sadly, a John Williams song doesn't play when the suns set there.
articles.content:
There are five systems more than trillions of miles away from Earth with multiple suns that might be hospitable for life.
If multiple suns brings to mind Luke Skywalker's home planet of Tatooine in … [+3575 chars]
